message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go right now.  I'm very interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $10,500.  What do you think?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10,800. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.
